Little Mix:
Let us take a look at Little Mix's journey on the Spotify Top 200 Weekly South Africa chart. 
 They have had a total of 6 songs with approximately 236152810 million streams. 
As of 2023-04-20, they have released music with RCA Records Label .... Syco Music
They first appeared on the chart on 2016-12-29. Their most recent appearance has been on 2020-11-19
Their highest position on the chart is 59 for the song Touch which was at this position on 2017-04-06
Their lowest position on the chart is 200 for the song Power (feat. Stormzy) which was at this position on 2017-07-06
The songs of theirs that have appeared on the chart are Break Up Song ... Shout Out to My Ex ... Sweet Melody ... Touch ... No More Sad Songs (feat. Machine Gun Kelly) ... Power (feat. Stormzy)
